system.requirements: Character must have Psyker Trait, and Psyniscience and Forbidden Lore(Warp), Scholastic Lore (Occult) or Forbidden Lore(Psykers) adds +10 to Test. Ritual performed in area undergoing upheaval such as a battle or horde of cultists chanting, or another ritual involving Daemon Summoning.
system.effect: A Psy Rating km Radius area (+/- 1d5 hundred metres per 2 hours) is infused with the warp for 2d5 x Psy Rating Hours, +1 hour per Degree of Success (if odd DoS, subtract instead). All Psykers in area gain +2 to Psy Rating, all Focus Power Tests have +10, any Rituals involving Daemon Summoning have +20. Any form of Psychic Resistance is half as effective. Every round, GM rolls one Psychic Phenomena.
system.costs: Everyone that does not have the Daemonic Trait within the area must make -10 Willpower Test per half hour, if fail, gain 1 Fatigue and lose 1d10 Wounds reduced by WP not AP/T. Anyone with 3+ DoF gains a Gift of the Gods.
system.failure: Psyker that conducted ritual must roll on Contempt of the Warp. GM rolls 1 Perils of the Warp per Degree of Failiure.
